response.original_title: The Polish Ambassador Live at Red Rocks
response.overview: The Polish Ambassador – Live at Red Rocks (2016) Recorded on June 12, 2016, at Red Rocks Amphitheatre in Morrison, Colorado, USA, this performance featured The Polish Ambassador (David Sugalski) as part of a lineup that included Matisyahu, Bluetech, Saul Williams, and Ayla Nereo at the renowned outdoor venue.  As a DJ and producer, The Polish Ambassador delivered an electronic set blending glitch, world-infused grooves, downtempo, and upbeat funk. The performance leveraged his self-described “Permaculture Action Movement” ethos, emphasizing sustainable community engagement and on-site solar power.  This Red Rocks appearance stands among The Polish Ambassador’s notable festival sets, showcasing his eclectic style, commitment to sustainability, and interactive live format.
response.title: The Polish Ambassador Live at Red Rocks
